submission.title: Application Submission
submission.description: Receive confirmation when you submit or withdraw an application.

outcome.title: Application Outcome
outcome.description: Be notified when your application is accepted or rejected.

new.title: New Applications
new.description: Get notified when a new application is received for your job posting.

accepted.title: Application Accepted (BCC)
accepted.description: Receive a copy when an applicant for your job is accepted.
